mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_item ( user_no, item_id, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{itemId}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT a.user_item_no, a.user_no, a.item_id, a.reg_date, a.upd_date, b.item_name, b.price, b.description, b.picture_url FROM user_item a INNER JOIN item b ON a.item_id = b.item_id WHERE user_item_no = #{userItemNo}

SELECT a.user_item_no, a.user_no, a.item_id, a.reg_date, a.upd_date, b.item_name, b.price, b.description, b.picture_url FROM user_item a INNER JOIN item b ON a.item_id = b.item_id WHERE user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY user_item_no DESC, reg_date DESC
